code: import{ApolloClient}from"apollo-client";import{InMemoryCache}from"apollo-cache-inmemory";import{HttpLink}from"apollo-link-http";var cache=new InMemoryCache();var link=new HttpLink({uri:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL,"/graphql")});var client=new ApolloClient({cache:cache,link:link});export default client;
